name: Curling (Matheus Palheta)
description:
Curling game on android.
HOW TO PLAY

Drag de rock to move it, touch on screen to create a path to guide the ball, the player who gets closer to the target center wins.

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/matheuspb95

CREDITS

This game was made with resources from UEA LUDUS (https://www.facebook.com/uealuduslab).
